content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **main street** - by tin can knits ========== -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- *there are many cities in the world with coffee culture but in the pacific northwest perpetually overcast skies and rainy days make our daily caffeine intake a ritualized necessity * *when i meet up with friends we inevitably end up at one of about a million coffee shops laughing and sipping and often knitting this coffee cozy fits with the bohemian vibe of main street it is a great project for using up odds and ends and makes a cute gift for your coffee companions * **like our designs ** get our email updates 1 so you don t miss our irresistible new patterns fabulous tutorials and subscriber-only special offers -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **pattern info** ============ **sizing** one size fits most 7 around by 4 5 tall **yarn** 50 yds dk weight yarn * we used rowan tweed in reeth and wensley * **needles** us #5 / 3 75 mm or as required to meet gauge double pointed needles **gauge** 22 sts / 4 gauge in stockinette stitch **notions** cable needle darning needle **helpful tutorials** casting on to double pointed needles 2 knitting on double pointed needles 3 cables 4 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 1 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 2 http //blog tincanknits com/2013/10/03/cast-on-dpns/ 3 http //blog tincanknits com/2013/08/17/knitting-on-dpns/ 4 http //blog tincanknits com/2009/08/01/how-to-cable/
